The white dagger is a White Knight weapon. Like all other white weaponry, to wield a white dagger the player must have completed the Wanted! quest, be a member, and have at least 10 Attack. Players that have a White Knight rank of Peon or higher can purchase white daggers from Sir Vyvin in the White Knights' Castle. It has roughly the same bonuses as a black dagger. This weapon can be poisoned, giving an advantage in combat.

As with all white weapons, players cannot make this using the Smithing skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "White dagger(+)" to "White dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "White dagger(s)" to "White dagger(p++)".

The '''white dagger''' is a [[White Knight equipment|White Knight]] [[weapon]]. Like all other white weaponry, to wield a white dagger the player must have completed the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]], be a [[member]], and have at least 10 [[Attack]]. Players that have a [[White Knight rank]] of Peon or higher can purchase white daggers from [[Sir Vyvin]] in the [[White Knights' Castle]]. It has roughly the same bonuses as a [[black dagger]]. This weapon can be [[poison]]ed, giving an advantage in [[combat]].

As with all [[white weapons]], players cannot make this using the [[Smithing]] [[skill]].
